verses.verse: Preserve<WH8104> me,<WH410> God, for in you do I take refuge.<WH2620>
My soul,<WH559> you have said to Yahweh,<WH3068> "You are my Lord.<WH3068> Apart from you I have no good thing.<WH2896>"
As for the saints<WH6918> who<WH1992> are in the earth,<WH776> they are the excellent<WH117> ones in whom is all my delight.<WH2656>

Their sorrows<WH6094> shall be multiplied<WH7235> who give<WH4116> gifts to another<WH312> god.<WH5262> Their drink offerings of blood<WH1818> I will not offer,<WH5258> nor<WH1077> take<WH5375> their names<WH8034> on my lips.<WH8193>
Yahweh<WH3068> assigned<WH2506> my portion<WH4490> and my cup.<WH3563> You made<WH8551> my lot secure.<WH1486>
The lines<WH2256> have fallen<WH5307> to me in pleasant<WH5273> places.<WH8231> Yes, I have a good inheritance.<WH5159>
I will bless<WH1288> Yahweh,<WH3068> who has given me counsel.<WH3289> Yes,<WH3629> my heart instructs<WH3256> me in the night seasons.<WH3915>
I have set<WH7737> Yahweh<WH3068> always<WH8548> before me.<WH3225> Because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.<WH4131>
Therefore my heart<WH3820> is glad,<WH8055> and my tongue<WH3519> rejoices.<WH1523> My body<WH1320> shall also dwell<WH7931> in safety.<WH983>
For you will not leave<WH5800> my soul<WH5315> in Sheol,<WH7585> neither will you allow<WH5414> your holy one<WH2623> to see<WH7200> corruption.<WH7845>
You will show<WH3045> me the path<WH734> of life.<WH2416> In your presence<WH6440> is fullness<WH7648> of joy.<WH8057> In your right hand<WH3225> there are pleasures<WH5273> forevermore.<WH5331>
